<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instrument of Slaughter](/Feats.aspx?ID=5924) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 99 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
champion’s reaction that grants extra damage with your Strikes (including the desecration, iniquity, and obedience causes)

</column>

---

Your blessed armament thirsts for the blood of your foes. Whenever you critically hit an enemy with a Strike that has the extra damage from your champion's reaction, the target also takes [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to two of the weapon's damage dice.
